nodes.text: These security droids were silver-plated humanoid droids employed in the Rig in the Stenness Node during the Clone Wars.

The security droids on the Rig were in charge of the holding cells in the Redemption Center, and were commonly found behind security consoles deep within the station. During the infiltration of the Rig by Mace Windu's Jedi strike force, Kit Fisto destroyed one of these droids with a kick to the head.
